attributes.action: make Joanna Lumley a member of the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that Ms Lumley shows substantial passion, loyalty and strength of character, together with an accurate judgement of the basic spirit of being British. She would make an invaluable contribution to this Legislative Chamber and help lead to the creation of a better society.

rejection.details: Please contact the House of Lords Appointments Commission http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Dl1/Directories/DG_10012020
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
